seo.title: Diamond Jacks Tattoo Parlour - Premium Custom Tattoos
seo.description: Award-winning tattoo studio specializing in custom designs. Expert artistry, premium quality, and exceptional service. Book your consultation today.

openGraph.title: Diamond Jacks Tattoo Parlour - Where Artistry Meets Excellence
openGraph.description: Premium tattoo studio creating stunning custom designs with expert craftsmanship and uncompromising quality.

headline: Premium Tattoo Artistry
Diamond Quality Guaranteed
hero.subheadline: Experience the finest in custom tattoo design with award-winning artistry and uncompromising attention to detail
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on detailed custom design

portfolio.subtitle: Each tattoo is a unique work of art, crafted with precision and passion

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your vision

testimonials.quote: Jack's attention to detail is incredible. My sleeve turned out better than I ever imagined. The quality is absolutely diamond standard.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: Professional, clean, and artistic beyond belief. Diamond Jacks is the only place I trust with my skin. Every piece is a masterpiece.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

paragraphs: With over 15 years of experience in the tattoo industry, Jack Diamond has established himself as one of the most respected artists in the field. His journey began with a passion for fine art and evolved into a dedication to creating permanent masterpieces on skin.

At Diamond Jacks Tattoo Parlour, every piece is approached with the same level of craftsmanship and attention to detail. From intricate black and grey work to vibrant color pieces, Jack's versatility and artistic vision ensure that each client receives a truly unique work of art.
about.callout: Every tattoo tells a story - let's create yours together.
about.imageAlt: Jack Diamond, professional tattoo artist and owner of Diamond Jacks Tattoo Parlour

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: For custom pieces, we recommend booking 2-3 weeks in advance. Smaller pieces and consultations can often be scheduled within the same week.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Every consultation includes design discussion, placement advice, sizing recommendations, and a detailed quote. We'll work together to ensure your vision becomes reality.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Diamond Quality Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Join hundreds of satisfied clients who chose excellence

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo vision and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your appointment.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your design.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit is required to secure your appointment and will be applied to your final session cost.
